meanings.definition: A type of herb used in traditional Chinese medicine.
meanings.sent1: The moxas were carefully prepared by the herbalist.
meanings.sent2: In Chinese medicine, moxas are believed to have healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The moxas danced in the pot as they were being brewed for the medicine.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the moxas filled the room, bringing a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The bright green color of the moxas contrasted with the dark herbs in the jar.

meanings.definition: The act of applying moxas to the skin for therapeutic purposes.
meanings.sent1: She felt the warmth of the moxas on her skin during the treatment.
meanings.sent2: The moxas were carefully placed on specific points to stimulate healing.
meanings.sent3: As the moxas glowed, it felt like tiny suns on her skin.
meanings.sent4: The moxas left a trail of warmth wherever they touched her skin.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of the moxas brought relief to her aching muscles.
